innhold.avsnitt: To be entitled to parental benefit, you must have worked for six of the past ten months. Days without work included in the qualifying period:

liste.punkt: If you have been working for four consecutive weeks and there are no more than 14 days between each time you are at work, days without work are also included in the qualifying period.
If you have an employment agreement entailing fixed shifts, the days you do not work will be included in the qualifying period, even if you work less frequently than every 14th day.
Holiday and time off in lieu of pay are also included.
